text: “Ndipo adanena: “Ndithu inu mwasankha mafano kukhala milungu kusiya Allah, ndipo mukukondana pakati panu m’moyo wa pa dziko; (pokhalirana pamodzi ndi kupitiriza kupembedza mafanowo mwachimvano). Koma tsiku la Qiyâma, mudzakanana wina ndi mnzake, komanso mudzatembelerana wina ndi mnzake, malo anu adzakhala ku Moto, ndipo simudzapeza okupulumutsani.”
